subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Bill Polian, who drafted Peyton Manning in 1998, is a rarity among TV sports analysts, a field crowded with ex-players, coaches and managers but few former general managers.
snippet: Bill Polian, who drafted Peyton Manning in 1998, is a rarity among TV sports analysts, a field crowded with ex-players, coaches and managers but few former general managers.
